pages.text: By standing in close range of a brewing stand and pressing $(6)$(l)[$(k:saveToolbarActivator)]$() with an Empty Potion Vial in hand, the Witcher will expend 1 $(l:crafting/alcohest#page_alcohest)[Alcohest]$() to refill that potion vial. Although more inefficient than $(l:potions/meditation#page_meditation)Meditation$(), refreshing a potion can be done at any time of day with only a brewing stand required.
Requires 1 $(l:crafting/alcohest#page_alcohest)[Alcohest]$() to refill per Empty Potion Vial.
